wikipedia_page.main: Sir Roger Sewell Bacon, MBE (23 January 1895 – 17 February 1962) was a British judge who was Chief Justice of Gibraltar (1946–55) and a Justice of Appeal on the East African Court of Appeal (1955–57).

response: * Roger Sewell Bacon, MBE. Lately Justice of Appeal, East African Court of Appeal.
*Sir Roger Sewell Bacon (1895–1962), British judge and Chief Justice of Gibraltar
